column5: Turn on controller support in steamoptions. Thats it.
Its almost as if different people like different things.
Doesnt really have anything to do with eso though.. thats just people being nice 😙
Oh boy. 5 days. The world is gonna end.
Last week they said that they will let us know when...
Oh snap. I wonder if shield+spear could be a thing. So many possibilities.. i can only get so hyped 🤓
Hopefully i can mask my lack of skills with being more tanky... hopefully 😓

A new cool mmo. A new world to discover. The housing crafting and territory stuff looks amazing. Also the weaponsystem looks badass, cant wait to make a shield+pistol tankyboi.. less than 2 months to go hypuuu!

In my bronze games ppl get flamed based on their op.gg

Euw the best
Didnt he used to play with elementz and saintvicous? Damn that was a long time ago 😀

Domblow/purity guardian. Some meatshield zombros and 2 frenzy apes. 

Minions. Always minions!
Clearly you need others to tell you whats fun.. even if you say you dont care. Okaaaay 😅

I love skellies to death its all ive been playing the last 2 years. But seeing people were doing juggernaut skellies i wouldnt be surprised they will be nerfed. They do lots of damage for not a lot of investment.
+2. Skellies. Agony.. oh maybe something for mistress of sacrifice (or spirit offering)

Thats all you get though.. opinions.. everyone likes hc/sc for different reasons. Youre not better or worse or cooler if you choose any of them. YOU have to play the game.

I dont like hc because i dont like dying and having to redo all the time lost. I dont like trading either so i always play SSF SC.

Honestly noone will give a flying F what you play 😉
Skellie nerfs, herald of agony nerf. Likely a small necro nerf (maybe +1 instead of +2)
We are chris
Well.. now i will! 😓
Minions. Spectres zombies skellies phantasms herald of purity.
Probably true. I even specced full toughness and 0 spelldamage on the tree. Kinda sad actually 😢

Have been playing summoner since level 15. Im level35 now. I use both zombies and the golem. And plagueburst+anomaly.

Lots of times minions just stand around. Some bosses (p2 lambach) they dont attack at all. Archers+mage golem shoot into walls. We really need icons at the bottom for the minions (number+health perhaps). Collision/hitboxxes are terrible. Zombies are squishie af. All minion ai is slow af.

Trying to build block/life and the minion nodes ofc.

Feels like minions were added as an afterthought.. they need a loooot of work!
Very well said i agree with every point youve made.
Gonna try and conjure up some kind of tanky summoner. Minions or go home! 😍
The game has never ran as dogshit for me as it ran in the 1.5months i played metamorph.
Spirit offering does not give ES on kill, it gives ES based on your HP when you consume a corpse.. Fortifyboots is from Elder influence. Its a nice build though thats true 🤓
Was one of the metamorphs the scorpion that burrows? I have had it happen aswell.
It would be a barren place if these were all enforced.. 😅
Just tradeleague things.. 😅
Ssme for "corrupted" (or does that work?). Also if i have a normal tab with uniques i can search for "poison" or "minion". Doesnt seem to work in the unique-tab.
Seems a lot better than my 6link geofris baptism 😅

Would you die for it though? 😅

E: Woops shouldve known, someone beat me to it.. doh!
Very cool staff bro!!
Too late to the party but i was imagining a tabula would drop 😅
Haha this is pure gold
PRAISE LE TOUCAN
Laughed so hard at this. Thanks 🤘

I see what you did there..

And i love it 🤘
Thank you. Going to keep it open in a Chrome-tab and slowly read through it the coming days. Thanks for the effort greatly apreciated. Love from the netherlands 😚
Damn right! Wouldnt miss it for a second if it could just fuck off!
Yes summoner = dead!! 😅
Cool, thank you!
Oh wow thats actually nice to hear. Didnt really play in 3.8 but i also wasnt a fan of early delving.
Green lasers, yellow lasers, blue lasers 😉
Always hunter.
Hunter is the best class.
Cant mog maces on sv hunter! 😢
F that worldquest!
Its like asking what food tastes the best. What do you expect? Its just gonna be ppl giving their own opinion. Whats fun for me might be boring for you..
Infected mushroom vibes i love it
Recently got into DH and fell in love but have been wondering for a few days what could be done for a 3rd spec. Ranged/glaive sounds pretty badass, nice!
I think thats the one yup! 😉
Not just elves. I want more races even if they dont make a lot of sense 😎

My long lost twin-brother!

Gonna get my dh classmount tonight after work! 🤘

Edit; i never enjoyed melee in pvp as much as i have with DH.

Either you suck it up and play the class you enjoy the most or you play the class you enjoy less. Last week in AV i finaly leveled up a demonhunter and while my hunter basicly has everything i dont think ill play him that much anymore. 

If you end up going back to your old main you still have all the stuff there!
I want more races for demonhunters!
I kind of enjoy this about the random groups. You never know what youll get. Very interesting

I need like 4k for mechagon and 5k for nazjatar. I only do nazjatar when theres emmisary so thats like once a week. Mecha isnt too bad. I just craft a bunch of jetpacks and only do the worldquest there. Obviously nazjatar is the bottleneck for me.

Should have it in a couple weeks, hype!
If the class idea is awesome but it plays like crap.. no thanks. If the gameplay is awesome but fantasy/logic whatever is poopy i would still play it!
This!! I used this exact addon untill i had my esseces.
Got it yesterday from wowinterface.. best addon ever ❤
Just came back to retail after playing classic since it launched! 🤓😍
